text: 3.22 Lom 3.9-19, 3.23, 4.11-12, 4.16, 11.32 Buk Baybol tɨkɨlak tek nep mɨdeb. Chɨn binɨb man okok mɨdupsek tap si tap tɨmel adek ak gon gon, gach anɨb ak chɨnop nag lek, ke koŋɨm amnɨgun tek ma lup. Pen binɨb Jisas Klays nop gos lɨnɨgɨnɨgabun okok, God gɨnɨgayn agɨl aglak tek gɨl chɨnop dɨnɨgab.
